name: 'A Rougelike Platformer' [DEMO]
description:
[WARNING THIS IS A DEMO THIS IS NOT COMPLETED]

Hello and welcome to the demo of 'A Rougelike Platformer' which is heavily inspired by Spelunky.

In this game you will travel through different dungeons of eternia with different looks.

If people enjoy this I might make the full game.

/\/\INSTRUCTIONS IN GAME/\/\

By the way:

Press E to edit the level

Press R to generate a new level

And the shop doesn't work
